name: Simple API endpoint based on Webhook
description:
Easily create a simple API endpoint with this webhook-based template. This automation allows you to receive data via a webhook, process it, and send back a response in real-time. Perfect for lightweight API setups, the webhook can handle requests, trigger actions, and provide custom responses, making it an ideal foundation for a mini app or integration.

You can also expand this automation by connecting the webhook to a database or external service, enabling you to store, analyze, or forward data seamlessly. Ideal for developers and small businesses looking to quickly set up custom endpoints for apps, bots, or integrations. Just customize the workflow, and let the webhook handle your API needs with minimal effort!
